title: 求自定义生怪指令
author: free8605
txt_content:
在做1.11.2地图，生怪指令不会打，站内找的minecraft command helper,其他条件都行，只有血量改不了，MCH只调血量的例子：/summon minecraft:silverfish ~ ~1 ~ {Health:60f}复制代码无效  

又找了个增加血量可用的，可这个不知怎么添加其他属性
/summon husk ~ ~1 ~ {Attributes:[{Name:generic.maxHealth,Base:200f}],Health:200.0f}
复制代码
其他帖子推荐找到这个http://minecraft.tools/en/spawn.php，随便设置下属性：/summon minecraft:husk ~ ~1 ~ {CustomName:HAH,CustomNameVisible:1,Health:100,Fire:0,Attributes:[{Name:"generic.followRange",Base:20},{Name:"generic.movementSpeed",Base:0.4f}],HandItems:[{id:"minecraft:iron_sword",Count:1},{id:"minecraft:shield",Count:1}],ArmorItems:[{Count:1,id:"minecraft:iron_boots"},{Count:1,id:"minecraft:iron_leggings"},{Count:1,id:"minecraft:iron_chestplate"},{id:"minecraft:skull",Damage:3}],ArmorDropChances:[0.35F,0.4F,0.4F,0F]}复制代码和MCH一样除了血量其他都行
@阴阳师元素祭祀  回答别人1.9的
/summon Zombie ~ ~1 ~ {CustomName:"我是自定义名字",
CustomNameVisible:1,Glowing:1,Attributes:[{Name:"generic.maxHealth",Base:最大生命},{Name:"g
eneric.followRange",Base:探测范围},{Name:"generic.movementSpeed",Base:移动速度f},{Name:"generic.attackDamage",Base
:攻击伤害},{Name:"zombie.spawnReinforcements",Base:0.33f}],ArmorItems:[{鞋子},{裤子},{衣服},{id:"minecraft:leather_helm
et",tag:{display:{color:1875981,Name:"绿帽子",Lore:["说明"]},ench:[{id:0,lvl:4}]}}]}复制代码把能换的全换了 无效啊
我不要看WIKI了  只求一个1.11.2血量能增，其他属性能使的示例

replies.author: free8605
replies.txt_content:
hqqaazz 发表于 2017-2-18 08:49
/summon zombie ~ ~1 ~ 
{Health:30.0f,Attributes:[0:{Name:generic.maxHealth,Base:30},1:{Name:generic. ...
你能在这个基础上加上个自定义名字 ，然后随便穿上点装备  最后设置下掉率吗？

replies.author: yuningning520
replies.txt_content: 你在 http://minecraft.tools/en/spawn.php 弄完了找Health:里边加上.0f血量就有效了啊
